SEARCH
Package pt.uc.dei.utils

Class JWTUtil

java.lang.Object
pt.uc.dei.utils.JWTUtil
@ApplicationScoped public class JWTUtil extends Object
Utility class for handling JWT (JSON Web Token) authentication and authorization.

Provides methods to generate, validate, and extract claims from JWT tokens for user authentication. Uses a secret key stored in environment variables for signing the tokens. Supports extracting user information from HTTP and WebSocket requests.

  • Field Details

    • SECRET_KEY

      public static String SECRET_KEY
      Secret key used for signing JWTs. Retrieved from environment variables for security purposes.

    • configurationRepository

      private ConfigurationRepository configurationRepository
      Injected EJB ConfigurationRepository to fetch configuration settings. Used to retrieve authentication expiration time for tokens.

    • generateToken

      public String generateToken(UserResponseDTO user)
      Generates a JWT authentication token for the given user.
      Parameters:
      user - The user DTO containing authentication details.
      Returns:
      A signed JWT token containing user authentication claims.

    • validateToken

      public static io.jsonwebtoken.Claims validateToken(String token)
      Validates a given JWT token and extracts claims.
      Parameters:
      token - The JWT token to validate.
      Returns:
      Extracted claims from the JWT.
      Throws:
      io.jsonwebtoken.JwtException - if the token is invalid or expired

    • getExpiration

      Extracts the expiration date from a JWT token.
      Parameters:
      token - The JWT token.
      Returns:
      The expiration date of the token.

    • getIdFromContainerRequestContext

      public static Long getIdFromContainerRequestContext(jakarta.ws.rs.container.ContainerRequestContext requestContext)
      Extracts the user ID from a JWT token in a ContainerRequestContext (JAX-RS request).
      Parameters:
      requestContext - The ContainerRequestContext containing cookies.
      Returns:
      The user ID as Long, or null if invalid or missing.

    • isUserAdmin

      public static boolean isUserAdmin(String jwtToken)
      Checks if the user associated with the JWT token has admin privileges.
      Parameters:
      jwtToken - The JWT token.
      Returns:
      true if the user is admin, false otherwise.

    • extractUserIdOrAbort

      public static Long extractUserIdOrAbort(String jwtToken) throws JWTUtil.JwtValidationException
      Extracts the user ID from a JWT token or throws an exception if invalid.
      Parameters:
      jwtToken - The JWT token.
      Returns:
      The user ID as Long.
      Throws:
      JWTUtil.JwtValidationException - if the token is missing or invalid.

    • buildUnauthorizedResponse

      Builds a JAX-RS unauthorized response with a custom message.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
